titleInfo.title: Sketch of survey of lots nos. 10, 11 and 12 in the Fourth Conn. of Township of Barton

physicalDescription.note: 1 map ; 39 x 38 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso. Some tears along edges.

mods.note: Scale "5chs. equal one Inch". The map is oriented with north pointing down. In the lower right corner of the map, there is a certification statement signed and dated, "Ths. Allen Blyth P.L.S. Hamilton April 20th, 1850". Writing along the right edge reads, "No 68 Drawer No 1". Streets appearing on the map include: Fourth Concession Road [now Concession Street], 5th Concession Road [now Fennell Avenue East], road allowance between Nos. 12 and 13 [now Upper Wellington Street], and road allowance between Nos. 10 and 11 [now Upper Wentworth Street].
